var.name: problemCount
var.desc: The count of all problems in this container.

var.name: runtimeErrorCount
var.desc: The count of runtime errors in this container.

var.name: langErrorCount
var.desc: The count of language errors in this container.

var.name: langWarningCount
var.desc: The count of language warnings in this container.

function.name: reset
function.desc: Deletes all problems from this container.

function.name: addProblem
function.desc: Adds a problem to this container.

var.name: problemLevel
var.desc: The problem level for the given error/exception.
